hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Discover the passion and craftsmanship behind every piece we create

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in the heart of Sofia, Bulgaria, Artisan Woodworks brings together generations of woodworking expertise with contemporary design sensibilities. Each piece we create tells a story of dedication, precision, and artistic vision.
story.paragraph2: We believe that furniture should be more than functionalâ€”it should be a reflection of your personality and a testament to quality craftsmanship that stands the test of time.

craftsmanship.title: Our Process
craftsmanship.subtitle: From concept to completion, every step is executed with meticulous care

step1.title: Design & Planning
step1.description: We work closely with you to understand your vision and create detailed plans that bring your ideas to life.

step2.title: Material Selection
step2.description: Only the finest woods are chosen, carefully inspected for quality, grain, and character.

step3.title: Handcrafted Construction
step3.description: Using traditional techniques combined with modern tools, we craft each piece with exceptional attention to detail.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to discuss your custom furniture project? We'd love to hear from you.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: At Artisan Woodworks, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
introduction.paragraph2: By using our website, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.paragraph: We may collect the following types of information:
collection.item1: Contact information (name, email address) when you reach out to us
collection.item2: Usage data and analytics through cookies and similar technologies
collection.item3: Any information you voluntarily provide when inquiring about our services

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.item1: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
usage.item3: Send you updates about our products (only with your consent)

security.title: Data Security
security.paragraph: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Access the personal information we hold about you
rights.item3: Request deletion of your personal information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Artisan Woodworks website and services. By accessing our website, you agree to these terms.

services.title: Our Services
services.paragraph: Artisan Woodworks provides handcrafted furniture design and manufacturing services. All products are custom-made and specifications are subject to agreement between you and Artisan Woodworks.

orders.title: Orders and Pricing
orders.paragraph: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. Prices are provided on a project-by-project basis and may vary based on materials, design complexity, and other factors. Final pricing will be confirmed before work begins.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.paragraph: All content on this website, including images, text, and designs, is the property of Artisan Woodworks and protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.paragraph: Artisan Woodworks is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or services. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for our services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.paragraph: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph: For questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at

productDetail.contactDescription: Get in touch to discuss custom options, pricing, and delivery.
